altTitles.en: The Sigh of a Wet Summer

description.en:
The Damp Breath Of Midsummer:
In paradise, Meguri encountered the sweet passion of temptation. At a summer resort on a southern island, Meguri doesn’t want to believe that she’s fallen in love with such a sparkly guy! But for some reason, the thought of him makes my, and the rest of the people in the world’s, heart thump. This love already --- can’t be stopped by anyone!

The Sweet Flower of Sin:
Sahara Yuiki is in love with her Sensei, but he doesnt even notice her... or does he?

Double Love Prince:
Ever since Yume saw 'Tomoki' win first place at a track competition she has been in a onesided love with him. But things are not always what they seem.

The Kidnapped Chocolate

Touch Me Kindly:
Mikuni Kouji helps to steady 'examiniee student' Kudoh Natsuki' nerves before taking the entrance exams and unknowingly steals her heart. Three months later -having narrowly getting in- Natsuki confesses. But he rejects her because she is stupid... WHAT! Natsuki suddenly makes a deal though "On the next midterm, if I can get above average after you tutoring me... you can do whatever you want with my body!"
description.fr:
One-Shot 1 ~ The Damp Breath Of Midsummer : Karin a décidé de passer une semaine à travailler dans l'auberge de son oncle située au bord de la mer. Elle est toute excitée à l'idée d'acceuillir ses premiers clients. A leur arrivée, ces derniers se rendent comptent qu'ils n'ont pas réservé au bon endroit...
One-Shot 2 ~ The Sweet Flower of Sin
One-Shot 3 ~ Double Love Prince
One-Shot 4 ~ The Kidnapped Chocolate
One-Shot 5 ~ Touch Me Kindly
